Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Darmanian Way, north of one of the many postal facilities.
Room.LongDescription: To the south is the North Oceancrest Post Office, where you can send mail to people, even in other cities. The postal service is very efficient and seldom loses mail. Darmanian Way continues to the east and west, intersecting with Rosecrest Street to the west.
